title: Ğ–Hğ”³ğŠ™

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player accepts your gift, you will gain a token.
- Gifts are usually beneficial to the recipient.
- Once you have a certain amount of tokens, relative to the amount of players alive at the host's discretion, you will continuously roleblock those who have accepted a gift.
 - This lasts until you die.
- If a player declines your gift, you will learn their role.
- Contracts last for the entire game, even after death and revival.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure you live to see your gift recipients reconsider their greed for nightmares.

desc:
Post 5269
*The demon's name is untranslatable. Best we've been able to do is Ehov.*
